title: [0 YoE, Unemployed, AI/Machine Learning/Software roles, Melbourne]
text:
Arjun Mehta
Melbourne, VIC ❖ arjun.mehta.ai@gmail.com ❖ LinkedIn ❖ github.com/arjunmehta-ai

Summary
Computer Science graduate specializing in AI/ML, cloud infrastructure, and data engineering. Hands-on
experience in building end-to-end pipelines, optimizing system costs, and translating technical solutions into
business value. Seeking roles to apply problem-solving abilities across diverse technical challenges.

EDUCATION
Bachelor of Computer Science                                                     Feb. 2022 – Nov. 2024
Major in Artificial Intelligence & Data Science
RMIT University, Melbourne, VIC
Leadership Achievement: Industry Experience Recognition

TECHNICAL SKILLS
Languages & Libraries: Python (PyTorch, TensorFlow, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Keras), SQL, JavaScript
ML/AI: Large Language Models, Fine-tuning (LoRA, QLoRA), Quantization, Generative AI, CNNs, LSTMs, Model
Evaluation
Cloud & DevOps: GCP (Compute Engine, AWS, MLOps Pipelines, Microsoft Azure
Data Engineering: ETL Pipelines, Feature Engineering, Data Preprocessing, Time Series Forecasting, Clustering
Visualization & Tools: Matplotlib, Seaborn, Excel, PowerBI, REST APIs

CERTIFICATIONS
AI-900 Microsoft Azure AI Fundamentals

PROJECTS
Calibrate and Fine-Tune Language Models to Reduce Model Hallucinations
▪ Maintained hallucination rates within a 2-3% margin of error across quantization methods (4-bit and 8-bit),
  cutting GPU expenses while preserving model reliability to make LLM deployment more economically viable.
▪ Reduced inference costs by 80% through model quantization while preserving factual accuracy on HaluEval
  benchmark.
▪ Engineered end-to-end GCP pipeline for fine-tuning Llama-2-7B on both in and out of domain datasets using
  LoRA/QLoRA to maintain accuracy.

5G Network Performance Analysis and Prediction
▪ Analyzed 10+ million network performance records using K-means clustering and LSTM models to forecast
  bandwidth degradation patterns, helping prioritize maintenance for underperforming cell towers.
▪ Built automated ETL pipeline to standardize and preprocess large-scale datasets, enabling time-series
  analysis across multiple network parameters with shorter data preparation time.
▪ Developed visualizations (Matplotlib, Seaborn) to communicate predictive insights to stakeholders,
  translating technical findings into strategic network optimization recommendations.

Proactive Research Assistant Chrome Extension
▪ Developed Chrome Extension that monitors academic browsing activity and proactively suggests relevant
  research papers with relevancy scoring in real-time floating sidebar for researchers.
▪ Implemented content scripts to detect research context from academic websites (arXiv, Google Scholar,
  IEEE) and fetch contextually relevant papers via arXiv API integration.
▪ Engineered background script architecture to bypass CORS restrictions, enabling seamless third-party API
  calls without compromising browser security.
▪ Integrated OpenAI API to perform deeper paper analysis and improve suggestion accuracy, reducing manual
  literature discovery time for niche research topics.

WORK EXPERIENCE
Gym Manager                                                                      June 2025 – Present
Northside Fitness, Melbourne, VIC
▪ Analyze membership data and business metrics to optimize operations and inform strategic decision-
  making.
▪ Implement process improvements using data-driven insights to enhance operational efficiency and
  customer satisfaction.
▪ Manage coordination between operations and marketing.

Waiter                                                                           May 2023 – June 2025
Laneway Dining, Melbourne, VIC
▪ Provide high quality customer service to over 300 customers a night, creating positive engagement to
  boost restaurant reviews by 17%.
▪ Worked collaboratively in a high-pressure environment, ensuring smooth operations through clear team
  communication.
